listing:

        contents: "people/grad-students/*.qmd"
        type: grid

        grid-item-align: center
    -   id: pi
        contents: "people/pi/*.qmd"

    -   id: alumni
        contents: "people/alumni/*.qmd"
        type: table
        sort: [ended desc, sortby]
        fields: [title, position, started, ended]
        sort-ui: [title, position, started, ended]
        filter-ui: [title, position, started, ended]
        field-display-names: 
            title: "Name"
            position: "Role"
            started: "Started"
            ended: "Ended"
